summary: The federal government faces an unsustainable fiscal future. If policies don't change, debt will continue to grow faster than the economy. Our review of the nation's fiscal health found: Large annual budget deficits drive debt growth, as the government borrows to finance spending that exceeds revenue Interest costs rise and make up a larger share of total spending as overall debt and interest rates increase...
title: The Nation's Fiscal Health: Road Map Needed to Address Projected Unsustainable Debt Levels
